subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Seahawks released Terrell Owens on Sunday. Peyton Manning threw his first two touchdown passes for the host Denver Broncos in a 29-24 loss to the San Francisco 49ers.
snippet: The Seahawks released Terrell Owens on Sunday. Peyton Manning threw his first two touchdown passes for the host Denver Broncos in a 29-24 loss to the San Francisco 49ers.
